entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Add AuthorizationOptions.PreferAllowAnonymous option #55093
  • Update Wix versions #55087
    Infrastructure
  • Chrome 123.0.6312.123 throws errors when accessing InteractiveServer applications #55085
  • how to create custom external provider authentication (sign-in with ethereum) #55083
  • Questions about Blazor component disposal #55082
  • How to make Url Page() does not check routing tables #55079
  • Make QuickGrids support Table features like Colgroup, Colspan, rowspan and more styling #55077
    Backlog
  • HttpResponse.OnCompleted callback not invoked on exception when using TestServer #55076
  • Updating Microsoft.AspNetCore.Components.WebAssembly.DevServer to 8.0.4 causing issues #55075
  • Perf regression: mvc #55074
  • SPA startup error - TimeoutException: The create-react-app server did not start listening for requests within the timeout period of 120 seconds. #55073

Closed

  • Add `AddHubOptions<>` SignalR extension to `IServiceCollection` #54116
  • BearerToken Authentication not working from Controller #54385
  • .NET 8 Blazor - StreamRendering - Magic Pill or Future Headache? #54157
    .NET 9 Planning
  • Upgrade Blazor WASM Authentication 'oidc-client' dependency to 'oidc-client-ts' #55081
  • [Hybrid] Animation lag during 1st render fragment load #54879
  • Updating a `workload` during the "patch Tuesday" release window corrupts most dotnet commands on Linux and macOS #55032
  • Security bypass vulnerability in ASP.NET Core #55070
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicminimalapipublishtrimr2rsinglefile, basicminimalapivanilla, basicminimalapivanilla #55043
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicminimalapipublishaot, basicminimalapipublishaot, todosapivanilla #55044
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicgrpcvanilla, basicgrpcvanilla, todosapipublishaot #55046
  • Benchmark stopped running: todosapipublishaot, todosapipublishtrimr2rsinglefile, todosapivanilla #55045
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicgrpcpublishaot, basicgrpcpublishaot, basicgrpcpublishtrimr2rsinglefile #55047
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicminimalapipublishtrimr2rsinglefile, basicminimalapivanilla, basicminimalapivanilla #55048
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicminimalapipublishaot, basicminimalapipublishaot, todosapivanilla #55049
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicgrpcvanilla, basicgrpcvanilla, todosapipublishaot #55051
  • Benchmark stopped running: todosapipublishaot, todosapipublishtrimr2rsinglefile, todosapivanilla #55050
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicgrpcpublishaot, basicgrpcpublishaot, basicgrpcpublishtrimr2rsinglefile #55052
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicgrpcgo #55053
  • Perf improvement: ApiCrudListProducts #55067
  • Perf improvement: multiple_queries #55035
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_ef #55022
  • Perf regression: fortunes #55036
  • Perf improvement: https #55065
  • Perf regression: fortunes #55066
  • [.net 8] Blazor webassembly debugger doesn't stop on exception #54834
  • Using Standard OIDC Authentication and CustomAuthenticationStateProvider Together Causes Error #54268
  • Binding content in Blazor results in duplication when element is initially empty. #54806
  • [Blazor]: Why enhance naviagation would clear the <head> element? #54658

PullRequests

Created

  • ALWAYS include the Vary Accept-Encoding header when response compression is enabled #55092
    community-contribution, area-middleware
  • Switch to dnceng pool for SDL tasks #55090
    area-infrastructure
  • Update Wix version #55088
    area-infrastructure
  • Add HybridCache public API #55084
    feature-caching, area-runtime
  • #49263 #55078
    area-blazor, community-contribution
  • Initial implementation of PAR in OIDC Handler #55069
    community-contribution, area-security

Merged

  • Merging internal commits for release/6.0 #55037
    area-infrastructure, 6.0.30
  • Merging internal commits for release/7.0 #55038
    area-infrastructure, 7.0.19
  • Merging internal commits for release/8.0 #55034
    area-infrastructure, 8.0.5
  • Add entry to aspnetcore to propagate EFCore into the VMR #55089
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview4
  • Reuse known keys in XmlKeyManager #54490
    area-dataprotection, pending-ci-rerun, 9.0-preview4
  • Add support for generating OpenAPI responses #55020
    area-mvc, feature-openapi, area-minimal

Updated

  • Improve the style for developer exception page #55042
    community-contribution, area-middleware
  • Introduce a logger provider that counts warnings and errors #54846
    area-dataprotection, pending-ci-rerun
  • Using SearchValues in ContentDispositionHeaderValue #55039
    community-contribution, area-networking
  • Add support for generating OpenAPI request bodies #55040
    area-mvc, feature-openapi, area-minimal
  • Include a warning about port spoofing in xml #54971
    community-contribution, area-networking, area-routing
  • update project templates use primary constructors #55006
    community-contribution, area-ui-rendering
